action.action-desc: Mr. Luetkemeyer (for himself, Mr. Hill, and Mr. Williams of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection to issue a rule before deleting or modifying certain small business loan data, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bank Loan Privacy Act.
Section 704B(e)(4) of the Equal Credit Opportunity Act (15 U.S.C. 1691c–2(e)(4)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking The Bureau may, and inserting:
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: The Bureau shall, before deleting or modifying data under this paragraph issue, through advance notice and comment, a rule that includes a description of what modifications and deletions the Bureau intends to make to the data and how such modifications and deletions will advance a privacy interest.
